LJCDocDataGen.remarks: Generates the DocData XML strings and optionally XML files.

GetFunctionName.summary: Sets the Function Name if present.
GetFunctionName.returns: The function name or null if not found.

GetPropertyName.summary: Sets the Property Name if present.
GetPropertyName.returns: The property name or null if not found.

ScrubFunctionName.summary: Gets the Function Name from the function token.

ScrubPropertyName.summary: Gets the Property Name from the property token.

CreateDocDataXMLString.summary: Creates and optionally writes the DocData XML.
CreateDocDataXMLString.param: Indicates if the XML file is to be written.

ProcessCode.summary: Generates the Doc data for the file.

DocOutputFileSpec.summary: Creates the DocData XML output file spec.

Debug.param: True if a cr/lf is included.
